short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily clear your browser's data and speedup browsing via toolbar popup.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browser Cleaner is an extension that help you easily clear browsing-data via toolbar popup UI.

All the available options are listed in toolbar popup, but, the number is dependent on your browser and platform. Simply mark a desired item, and then click on the big - eraser - button at the top. When the cleaning process ends, a desktop notification will notify you that the browser data has been cleared.

Note 1: None of the browsing-data items are selected by default. You need to open toolbar popup and select at least one item to start working with this addon.

Note 2: To report bugs, please fill the bug report form in the addon's homepage (https://mybrowseraddon.com/browser-cleaner.html).
